amendment.description: At the end of division B (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to carry out subsection (p) of section 12 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1760).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit the USDA from using funds to implement the Paid Lunch Equity provision in the National School Lunch Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Hartzler.
